I'm curious about different keyboard layouts, and how that correlates with typing speed (if at all).
I prepared a little 2 minute survey, and would be very grateful if you could take it. You can
find it on this [link](https://forms.gle/vprM4C8yk1bBGCNx8).

There's no R code in this blog post, but I'll be analyzing the data using R, promise :)
